like ZACH from Ex on the Beach.

Boost your confidence and have the perfect designer smile with dental veneers and crowns. Straighten your teeth with the future of orthodontics – Invisalign Aligners.

Zach had a mixture of veneers and crowns to cosmetically enhance his smile to the perfect, white, designer looking smile that makes all the difference when it comes to looking good, being confident and making first impressions count. Our highly experienced GDC registered dentist, Dr Charles Lister, transformed Zach’s smile step by step ensuring Zach was 100% happy with the end results.
